channel.title: meteo wind on Airspace
channel.description: Recent content in meteo wind on Airspace

item.title: Settings
item.description: The airspace app uses gps readings to calculate the prevailing wind speed and direction during the flight. To ensure a reliable estimation it’s necessary a minimum number of samples in a wide range of directions of flight.

item.title: Meteo wind estimation
item.description: One of the main features of today glide computers is the estimation of wind, the speed and direction of the air mass we’re moving in. It’s the base of other glide insturment estimations like the required time and altitude to reach a waypoint.
